name: Witchtanic Hallucinations Scented Candle
description:
Hand Made- as in: poured, dyed and scented by myself. 

The candle is 225grams in weight. The wax is a hybrid soy organic wax meaning that it burns longer. I dyed it black, as in really black using some organic locally made dye. 
It has a mild Brazilian Nut & Coffee scent, whilst being there is not overbearing. 

The candle comes is a nice glass with a black lid and a specific made branding, which means you can use the glass for all kinds of crap afterwards. 

19% VAT Includeed

name: Supremebeing x Black Lodges Varsity Jacket
description:
A classic light weight Varsity Jacket by Supremebeing, hand printed in the UK and extremely limited. 

Together with SheOne, Mr. Penfold and Ornamental Conifer I was part of a group of artists for this one-off project. 

Available here is the black and white version, it comes with a patch on the front and a hand printed design on the back. 

Outer: Heavy Cotton Canvas & PU Sleeves
Lining: 100% Nylon & 100% Cotton

Sizing, which is relevant to chest size: 

XS: 34-36 inches
S:   36-38 inches
M:  38-40 inches
L:   40-42 inches
XL: 42-44 inches 

To make your purchase that much more special, I am throwing in a wad of stickers and Sharpies with this purchase. 

To see the whole project please visit the Supremebeing site.

name: Heavy Fucking Metal
description:
Screen printed here in Hamburg on a premium Continental Men's Classic Fitted T-Shirt.
100% Combed Cotton Interlock 240g / 7.2oz.

Which means it's a solid, well fitting men's t-shirt. Not too heavy, not too light and fits like a charm. 

For you technical folks out there, these are the measurements: 

Chest: Small 18' inches, Medium 19' inches, Large 20' inches, XL 20.75' inches
Top to Bottom: Small 26' inches, Medium 27' inches, Large 29' inches, XL 29' inches. 

Shipping: We use international snail mail for these - looking at how long this has taken in the past, it ranges from 2 to 7 days, really depending on where you live. 

If you are ordering from Europe, generally, no more than 3 days from the day it is shipped. 
If you are ordering from anywhere else, this can take up to 7-10 days, from the day we ship. 

--

19% VAT INCLUDED

name: Poser Disposer Sharpie
description:
The Black Lodges "Poser Disposer" Sharpies have arrived. 

Thanks to our good friends over at the Ronin Network in California you can finally purchase the ultimate poser disposer unit. 

Technically, it is the Sharpie Fine Point Permanent Marker that we have all come to love, and yes, it is permanent and yes, again, it only comes in black.

Importantly, this product ships from California for the time being, so the price below is correct. It is in USD, taxes are added, all you need to do is add shipping costs.

You can order up to 5 sharpies and the shipping will remain the same.

name: Black Lodges Sticker Set
description:
A set of 6 more than awesome, locally made, stickers. 

No - you can't have any single ones either. Buy one, get them all. 

Each sticker set equals 2 of each stickers, so 12 in total. 

Each Sticker is 10 x 6cm or 4'x 2,5' inches. 

Shipping: We use international snail mail for these - looking at how long this has taken in the past, it ranges from 2 to 7 days, really depending on where you live. 

If you are ordering from Europe, generally, no more than 3 days from the day it is shipped. 
If you are ordering from anywhere else, this can take up to 7-10 days, from the day we ship. 

--

19% VAT INCLUDED

name: Crusher Destroyer Print
description:
12 x 12 inches or 30,5 x 30,5cm print for the 5th Anniversary Show at 1975 Gallery in Rochester, New York. 

Signed with a rubber stamp and limited to 75 pieces.

Each and every print has a different coffee staining on it as it was done by hand by the gallery. 

The print will ship flat and not in a roll and no, you are not buying it framed. 

19% VAT included. 

5€ Global Shipping because I love ya.

name: Mark Ward Poster
description:
This is a poster by Mark Ward. 

It is digitally printed on 182g paper- so it is not a fancy screen printed art print. Let's get that out of the way right away. 

That doesn't matter though because this poster is awesome and so is Mark Ward. Mark and I did this poster for an old idea I had back in 2009 called The Wild International. 

Mark Ward is an artist based in London, UK and his art has been used by brands such as Stussy, Burton, Medicom, Nike, Slam City Skates, Adidas, Atlantic Records and The Guardian. He is the real deal. check out his site and work here: www.markwardstudio.com

About the poster: 

It is A2 in size, that specifically means: 59cm x 42cm ( height x width ) or 23,39 inches x 16,54 inches. 

It is a digital print on 182g paper- 

The bottom left corner has " Mark Ward for The Wild International" printed on it. 

Limited to 20 posters ( that's all we have left ) 

Shipping will be done in poster tubes and wrapped in paper obviously. 

19% VAT included.
